TestCase.name: testAllowExpressionInCube1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT MOD(deptno, 20) AS d, COUNT(*) AS c, gender AS g FROM emp GROUP BY CUBE(MOD(deptno, 20), gender)

LogicalProject(d=[$0], c=[$2], g=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0}, {1}, {}]], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(d=[MOD($1, 20)], g=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

Calc(select=[d, c, g]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[d, g, $e], select=[d, g, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d, g, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{d=[$0], g=[$1], $e=[0]}, {d=[$0], g=[null], $e=[1]}, {d=[null], g=[$1], $e=[2]}, {d=[null], g=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- Calc(select=[MOD(deptno, 20) AS d, gender AS g]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender])

TestCase.name: testAllowExpressionInCube2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(*) AS c FROM emp GROUP BY CUBE(1)

LogicalProject(c=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], groups=[[{0}, {}]], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

Calc(select=[c]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[$f0, $e], select=[$f0, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f0, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{$f0=[$0], $e=[0]}, {$f0=[null], $e=[1]}]) +- Calc(select=[1 AS $f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender])

TestCase.name: testAllowExpressionInRollup1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT deptno + 1 AS d1, deptno + 1 - 1 AS d0, COUNT(*) AS c FROM emp GROUP BY ROLLUP (deptno + 1)

LogicalProject(d1=[$0], d0=[-($0, 1)], c=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], groups=[[{0}, {}]], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(d1=[+($1, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

Calc(select=[d1, -(d1, 1) AS d0, c]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[d1, $e], select=[d1, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d1, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{d1=[$0], $e=[0]}, {d1=[null], $e=[1]}]) +- Calc(select=[+(deptno, 1) AS d1]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender])

TestCase.name: testAllowExpressionInRollup2
TestCase.Resource: select MOD(deptno, 20) AS d, COUNT(*) AS c, gender AS g FROM emp GROUP BY ROLLUP(MOD(deptno, 20), gender)

LogicalProject(d=[$0], c=[$2], g=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0}, {}]], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(d=[MOD($1, 20)], g=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

Calc(select=[d, c, g]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[d, g, $e], select=[d, g, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d, g, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{d=[$0], g=[$1], $e=[0]}, {d=[$0], g=[null], $e=[1]}, {d=[null], g=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- Calc(select=[MOD(deptno, 20) AS d, gender AS g]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender])

TestCase.name: testAllowExpressionInRollup3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(*) AS c FROM emp GROUP BY ROLLUP(1)

LogicalProject(c=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], groups=[[{0}, {}]], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

Calc(select=[c]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[$f0, $e], select=[$f0, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f0, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{$f0=[$0], $e=[0]}, {$f0=[null], $e=[1]}]) +- Calc(select=[1 AS $f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender])

TestCase.name: testBasicGroupingSets
TestCase.Resource: SELECT deptno, COUNT(*) AS c FROM emps GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ((), (deptno))

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], groups=[[{0}, {}]], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emps, source: [TestTableSource(empno, name, deptno, gender, city, empid, age, slacker, manager, joinedat)]]])

Calc(select=[deptno, c]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[deptno, $e], select=[deptno, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{deptno=[$0], $e=[0]}, {deptno=[null], $e=[1]}]) +- Calc(select=[deptno]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emps, source: [TestTableSource(empno, name, deptno, gender, city, empid, age, slacker, manager, joinedat)]]], fields=[empno, name, deptno, gender, city, empid, age, slacker, manager, joinedat])

TestCase.name: testCALCITE1824
TestCase.Resource: SELECT deptno, GROUP_ID() AS g, COUNT(*) AS c FROM scott_emp GROUP BY GROUPING SETS (deptno, (), ())

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], groups=[[{0}, {}]], g=[GROUP_ID()], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$7]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[scott_emp, source: [TestTableSource(empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno)]]])

Calc(select=[deptno, 0 AS g, c]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[deptno, $e], select=[deptno, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{deptno=[$0], $e=[0]}, {deptno=[null], $e=[1]}]) +- Calc(select=[deptno]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[scott_emp, source: [TestTableSource(empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno)]]], fields=[empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno])

TestCase.name: testCube
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, c, AVG(a) AS a, GROUP_ID() AS g, GROUPING(b) AS gb, GROUPING(c) AS gc, GROUPING_ID(b) AS gib, GROUPING_ID(c) AS gic, GROUPING_ID(b, c) AS gid FROM MyTable GROUP BY CUBE (b, c)

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0}, {1}, {}]], a=[AVG($2)], g=[GROUP_ID()], gb=[GROUPING($0)], gc=[GROUPING($1)], gib=[GROUPING_ID($0)], gic=[GROUPING_ID($1)], gid=[GROUPING_ID($0, $1)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], c=[$2], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[b, c, a, 0 AS g, CASE(OR(=($e, 0), =($e, 1)), 0, 1) AS gb, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 0, 1) AS gc, CASE(OR(=($e, 0), =($e, 1)), 0, 1) AS gib, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 0, 1) AS gic, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 2, 3) AS gid]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b, c, $e], select=[b, c, $e, AVG(a) AS a]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b, c, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], $e=[0]}, {a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[null], $e=[1]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], c=[$2], $e=[2]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], c=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testCubeAndDistinct
TestCase.Resource: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM emp GROUP BY CUBE(deptno, gender)

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) +- LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0}, {1}, {}]], EXPR$0=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$1], gender=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

GroupAggregate(groupBy=[EXPR$0], select=[EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[EXPR$0]]) +- Calc(select=[EXPR$0]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[deptno, gender, $e], select=[deptno, gender, $e, COUNT(*) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno, gender, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{deptno=[$0], gender=[$1], $e=[0]}, {deptno=[$0], gender=[null], $e=[1]}, {deptno=[null], gender=[$1], $e=[2]}, {deptno=[null], gender=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- Calc(select=[deptno, gender]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender])

TestCase.name: testCubeAndJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT e.deptno, e.gender, MIN(e.ename) AS min_name FROM emp AS e JOIN dept AS d USING (deptno) GROUP BY CUBE(e.deptno, d.deptno, e.gender) HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 OR gender = 'M' AND e.deptno = 10

LogicalProject(deptno=[$0], gender=[$2], min_name=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(>($4, 2), AND(=($2, _UTF-16LE'M'), =($0, 10)))]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}], groups=[[{0, 1, 2}, {0, 1}, {0, 2}, {0}, {1, 2}, {1}, {2}, {}]], min_name=[MIN($3)], agg#1=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$1], deptno0=[$3], gender=[$2], ename=[$0]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[dept, source: [TestTableSource(deptno, dname)]]])

Calc(select=[deptno, gender, min_name], where=[OR(>($f5, 2), AND(=(gender, _UTF-16LE'M'), =(deptno, 10)))]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[deptno, gender, deptno0, $e], select=[deptno, gender, deptno0, $e, MIN(ename) AS min_name, COUNT(*) AS $f5]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno, gender, deptno0, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{ename=[$0], deptno=[$1], gender=[$2], deptno0=[$3], $e=[0]}, {ename=[$0], deptno=[$1], gender=[$2], deptno0=[null], $e=[1]}, {ename=[$0], deptno=[$1], gender=[null], deptno0=[$3], $e=[2]}, {ename=[$0], deptno=[$1], gender=[null], deptno0=[null], $e=[3]}, {ename=[$0], deptno=[null], gender=[$2], deptno0=[$3], $e=[4]}, {ename=[$0], deptno=[null], gender=[$2], deptno0=[null], $e=[5]}, {ename=[$0], deptno=[null], gender=[null], deptno0=[$3], $e=[6]}, {ename=[$0], deptno=[null], gender=[null], deptno0=[null], $e=[7]}]) +- Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(deptno, deptno0)], select=[ename, deptno, gender, deptno0]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno]]) +- Calc(select=[deptno]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[dept, source: [TestTableSource(deptno, dname)]]], fields=[deptno, dname])

TestCase.name: testCubeAsGroupingSets
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, c, AVG(a) AS a, GROUP_ID() AS g, GROUPING(b) AS gb, GROUPING(c) AS gc, GROUPING_ID(b) AS gib, GROUPING_ID(c) as gic, GROUPING_ID(b, c) AS gid FROM MyTable GROUP BY CUBE (b, c)

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0}, {1}, {}]], a=[AVG($2)], g=[GROUP_ID()], gb=[GROUPING($0)], gc=[GROUPING($1)], gib=[GROUPING_ID($0)], gic=[GROUPING_ID($1)], gid=[GROUPING_ID($0, $1)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], c=[$2], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[b, c, a, 0 AS g, CASE(OR(=($e, 0), =($e, 1)), 0, 1) AS gb, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 0, 1) AS gc, CASE(OR(=($e, 0), =($e, 1)), 0, 1) AS gib, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 0, 1) AS gic, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 2, 3) AS gid]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b, c, $e], select=[b, c, $e, AVG(a) AS a]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b, c, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], $e=[0]}, {a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[null], $e=[1]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], c=[$2], $e=[2]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], c=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testDuplicateArgumentToGrouping_id
TestCase.Resource: SELECT deptno, gender, GROUPING_ID(deptno, gender, deptno), COUNT(*) AS c FROM emp WHERE deptno = 10 GROUP BY ROLLUP(gender, deptno)

LogicalProject(deptno=[$1], gender=[$0], EXPR$2=[$2], c=[$3]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0}, {}]], EXPR$2=[GROUPING_ID($1, $0, $1)], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(gender=[$2], deptno=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($1, 10)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

Calc(select=[deptno, gender, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 5, 7) AS EXPR$2, c]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[gender, deptno, $e], select=[gender, deptno, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[gender, deptno, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{gender=[$0], deptno=[$1], $e=[0]}, {gender=[$0], deptno=[null], $e=[1]}, {gender=[null], deptno=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- Calc(select=[gender, CAST(10) AS deptno], where=[=(deptno, 10)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender])

TestCase.name: testSimpleCube
TestCase.Resource: SELECT deptno + 1, COUNT(*) AS c FROM emp GROUP BY CUBE(deptno, gender)

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[+($0, 1)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0}, {1}, {}]], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$1], gender=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

Calc(select=[+(deptno, 1) AS EXPR$0, c]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[deptno, gender, $e], select=[deptno, gender, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno, gender, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{deptno=[$0], gender=[$1], $e=[0]}, {deptno=[$0], gender=[null], $e=[1]}, {deptno=[null], gender=[$1], $e=[2]}, {deptno=[null], gender=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- Calc(select=[deptno, gender]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender])

TestCase.name: testFromBlogspot
TestCase.Resource: SELECT deptno, job, empno, ename, SUM(sal) sumsal, CASE GROUPING_ID(deptno, job, empno) WHEN 0 THEN CAST('grouped by deptno,job,empno,ename' as varchar) WHEN 1 THEN CAST('grouped by deptno,job' as varchar) WHEN 3 THEN CAST('grouped by deptno' as varchar) WHEN 7 THEN CAST('grouped by ()' as varchar) END gr_text from scott_emp GROUP BY ROLLUP(deptno, job, (empno,ename)) ORDER BY deptno, job, empno

LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], sort2=[$2], dir0=[ASC-nulls-first], dir1=[ASC-nulls-first], dir2=[ASC-nulls-first]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$0], job=[$1], empno=[$2], ename=[$3], sumsal=[$4], gr_text=[CASE(=($5, 0), _UTF-16LE'grouped by deptno,job,empno,ename', =($5, 1), _UTF-16LE'grouped by deptno,job', =($5, 3), _UTF-16LE'grouped by deptno', =($5, 7), _UTF-16LE'grouped by ()', null)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2, 3}], groups=[[{0, 1, 2, 3}, {0, 1}, {0}, {}]], sumsal=[SUM($4)], agg#1=[GROUPING_ID($0, $1, $2)]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$7], job=[$2], empno=[$0], ename=[$1], sal=[$5]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[scott_emp, source: [TestTableSource(empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno)]]])

Calc(select=[deptno, job, empno, ename, sumsal, CASE(=(CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 3), 1, =($e, 7), 3, 7), 0), _UTF-16LE'grouped by deptno,job,empno,ename', =(CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 3), 1, =($e, 7), 3, 7), 1), _UTF-16LE'grouped by deptno,job', =(CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 3), 1, =($e, 7), 3, 7), 3), _UTF-16LE'grouped by deptno', =(CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 3), 1, =($e, 7), 3, 7), 7), _UTF-16LE'grouped by ()', null) AS gr_text]) +- Sort(orderBy=[deptno ASC, job ASC, empno ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[deptno, job, empno, ename, $e], select=[deptno, job, empno, ename, $e, SUM(sal) AS sumsal]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno, job, empno, ename, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{deptno=[$0], job=[$1], empno=[$2], ename=[$3], sal=[$4], $e=[0]}, {deptno=[$0], job=[$1], empno=[null], ename=[null], sal=[$4], $e=[3]}, {deptno=[$0], job=[null], empno=[null], ename=[null], sal=[$4], $e=[7]}, {deptno=[null], job=[null], empno=[null], ename=[null], sal=[$4], $e=[15]}]) +- Calc(select=[deptno, job, empno, ename, sal]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[scott_emp, source: [TestTableSource(empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno)]]], fields=[empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno])

TestCase.name: testGroupingAcceptsMultipleArgumentsGivesSameResultAsGrouping_id
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(*) AS c, GROUPING(deptno) AS gd, GROUPING_ID(deptno) AS gid, GROUPING(deptno, gender, deptno) AS gdgd, GROUPING_ID(deptno, gender, deptno) AS gidgd FROM emp GROUP BY ROLLUP(deptno, gender) HAVING GROUPING(deptno) <= GROUPING_ID(deptno, gender, deptno)

LogicalProject(c=[$2], gd=[$3], gid=[$4], gdgd=[$5], gidgd=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($3, $6)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0}, {}]], c=[COUNT()], gd=[GROUPING($0)], gid=[GROUPING_ID($0)], gdgd=[GROUPING($0, $1, $0)], gidgd=[GROUPING_ID($0, $1, $0)]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$1], gender=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

Calc(select=[c, CASE(OR(=($e, 0), =($e, 1)), 0, 1) AS gd, CASE(OR(=($e, 0), =($e, 1)), 0, 1) AS gid, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 2, 7) AS gdgd, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 2, 7) AS gidgd]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[deptno, gender, $e], select=[deptno, gender, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno, gender, $e]]) +- Calc(select=[deptno, gender, $e], where=[<=(CASE(OR(=($e, 0), =($e, 1)), 0, 1), CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 2, 7))]) +- Expand(projects=[{deptno=[$0], gender=[$1], $e=[0]}, {deptno=[$0], gender=[null], $e=[1]}, {deptno=[null], gender=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- Calc(select=[deptno, gender]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender])

TestCase.name: testGroupingGroup_idGrouping_idInSelectClauseOfGroupByQuery
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(*) as c, GROUPING(deptno) AS g, GROUP_ID() AS gid, GROUPING_ID(deptno) AS gd, GROUPING_ID(gender) AS gg, GROUPING_ID(gender, deptno) AS ggd, GROUPING_ID(deptno, gender) AS gdg FROM emp GROUP BY ROLLUP(deptno, gender)

LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$3], gid=[$4], gd=[$5], gg=[$6], ggd=[$7], gdg=[$8]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0}, {}]], c=[COUNT()], g=[GROUPING($0)], gid=[GROUP_ID()], gd=[GROUPING_ID($0)], gg=[GROUPING_ID($1)], ggd=[GROUPING_ID($1, $0)], gdg=[GROUPING_ID($0, $1)]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$1], gender=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

Calc(select=[c, CASE(OR(=($e, 0), =($e, 1)), 0, 1) AS g, 0 AS gid, CASE(OR(=($e, 0), =($e, 1)), 0, 1) AS gd, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1) AS gg, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 2, 3) AS ggd, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 1, 3) AS gdg]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[deptno, gender, $e], select=[deptno, gender, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno, gender, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{deptno=[$0], gender=[$1], $e=[0]}, {deptno=[$0], gender=[null], $e=[1]}, {deptno=[null], gender=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- Calc(select=[deptno, gender]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender])

TestCase.name: testGroupingGrouping_idAndGroup_id
TestCase.Resource: SELECT deptno, gender, GROUPING(deptno) gd, GROUPING(gender) gg, GROUPING_ID(deptno, gender) dg, GROUPING_ID(gender, deptno) gd, GROUP_ID() gid, COUNT(*) c FROM emp GROUP BY CUBE(deptno, gender)

LogicalProject(deptno=[$0], gender=[$1], gd=[$2], gg=[$3], dg=[$4], gd0=[$5], gid=[$6], c=[$7]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0}, {1}, {}]], gd=[GROUPING($0)], gg=[GROUPING($1)], dg=[GROUPING_ID($0, $1)], gd=[GROUPING_ID($1, $0)], gid=[GROUP_ID()], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$1], gender=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

Calc(select=[deptno, gender, CASE(OR(=($e, 0), =($e, 1)), 0, 1) AS gd, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 0, 1) AS gg, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 2, 3) AS dg, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 2, =($e, 2), 1, 3) AS gd0, 0 AS gid, c]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[deptno, gender, $e], select=[deptno, gender, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno, gender, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{deptno=[$0], gender=[$1], $e=[0]}, {deptno=[$0], gender=[null], $e=[1]}, {deptno=[null], gender=[$1], $e=[2]}, {deptno=[null], gender=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- Calc(select=[deptno, gender]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender])

TestCase.name: testGroupingInSelectClauseOfCubeQuery
TestCase.Resource: SELECT deptno, job, COUNT(*) AS c, GROUPING(deptno) AS d, GROUPING(job) j, GROUPING(deptno, job) AS x FROM scott_emp GROUP BY CUBE(deptno, job)

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0}, {1}, {}]], c=[COUNT()], d=[GROUPING($0)], j=[GROUPING($1)], x=[GROUPING($0, $1)]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$7], job=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[scott_emp, source: [TestTableSource(empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno)]]])

Calc(select=[deptno, job, c, CASE(OR(=($e, 0), =($e, 1)), 0, 1) AS d, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 0, 1) AS j, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 2, 3) AS x]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[deptno, job, $e], select=[deptno, job, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno, job, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{deptno=[$0], job=[$1], $e=[0]}, {deptno=[$0], job=[null], $e=[1]}, {deptno=[null], job=[$1], $e=[2]}, {deptno=[null], job=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- Calc(select=[deptno, job]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[scott_emp, source: [TestTableSource(empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno)]]], fields=[empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno])

TestCase.name: testGroupingInSelectClauseOfGroupByQuery
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(*) AS c, GROUPING(deptno) AS g FROM emp GROUP BY deptno

LogicalProject(c=[$1], g=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], c=[COUNT()], g=[GROUPING($0)]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

Calc(select=[c, 0 AS g]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[deptno], select=[deptno, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno]]) +- Calc(select=[deptno]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender])

TestCase.name: testGroupingInSelectClauseOfRollupQuery
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(*) AS c, deptno, GROUPING(deptno) AS g FROM emp GROUP BY ROLLUP(deptno)

LogicalProject(c=[$1], deptno=[$0], g=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], groups=[[{0}, {}]], c=[COUNT()], g=[GROUPING($0)]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

Calc(select=[c, deptno, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1) AS g]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[deptno, $e], select=[deptno, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{deptno=[$0], $e=[0]}, {deptno=[null], $e=[1]}]) +- Calc(select=[deptno]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender])

TestCase.name: testGroupingSets
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, c, AVG(a) AS a, GROUP_ID() AS g FROM MyTable GROUP BY GROUPING SETS (b, c)
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0}, {1}]], a=[AVG($2)], g=[GROUP_ID()]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], c=[$2], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[b, c, a, 0 AS g]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b, c, $e], select=[b, c, $e, AVG(a) AS a]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b, c, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[null], $e=[1]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], c=[$2], $e=[2]}]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupingSets2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, c, AVG(a) AS a FROM MyTable GROUP BY GROUPING SETS (b, c, ())
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0}, {1}, {}]], a=[AVG($2)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], c=[$2], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[b, c, a]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b, c, $e], select=[b, c, $e, AVG(a) AS a]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b, c, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[null], $e=[1]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], c=[$2], $e=[2]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], c=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupingSets3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, c, AVG(a) AS a, GROUP_ID() AS g, GROUPING(b) AS gb, GROUPING(c) AS gc, GROUPING_ID(b) AS gib, GROUPING_ID(c) AS gic, GROUPING_ID(b, c) AS gid, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM MyTable GROUP BY GROUPING SETS (b, c, ())

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0}, {1}, {}]], a=[AVG($2)], g=[GROUP_ID()], gb=[GROUPING($0)], gc=[GROUPING($1)], gib=[GROUPING_ID($0)], gic=[GROUPING_ID($1)], gid=[GROUPING_ID($0, $1)], cnt=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], c=[$2], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[b, c, a, 0 AS g, CASE(=($e, 1), 0, 1) AS gb, CASE(=($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 0, 1) AS gc, CASE(=($e, 1), 0, 1) AS gib, CASE(=($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 0, 1) AS gic, CASE(=($e, 1), 1, =($e, 2), 2, 3) AS gid, cnt]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b, c, $e], select=[b, c, $e, AVG(a) AS a, COUNT(*) AS cnt]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b, c, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[null], $e=[1]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], c=[$2], $e=[2]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], c=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupingSetsOnExpression
TestCase.Resource: SELECT deptno + 1, COUNT(*) AS c FROM emps GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ((), (deptno + 1))

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], groups=[[{0}, {}]], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[+($2, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emps, source: [TestTableSource(empno, name, deptno, gender, city, empid, age, slacker, manager, joinedat)]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0, c]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[EXPR$0, $e], select=[EXPR$0, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[EXPR$0, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{EXPR$0=[$0], $e=[0]}, {EXPR$0=[null], $e=[1]}]) +- Calc(select=[+(deptno, 1) AS EXPR$0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emps, source: [TestTableSource(empno, name, deptno, gender, city, empid, age, slacker, manager, joinedat)]]], fields=[empno, name, deptno, gender, city, empid, age, slacker, manager, joinedat])

TestCase.name: testGroupingInOrderByClause
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(*) AS c FROM emp GROUP BY ROLLUP(deptno) ORDER BY GROUPING(deptno), c

LogicalProject(c=[$0]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], sort1=[$0], dir0=[ASC-nulls-first], dir1=[ASC-nulls-first]) +- LogicalProject(c=[$1], EXPR$1=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], groups=[[{0}, {}]], c=[COUNT()], agg#1=[GROUPING($0)]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

Calc(select=[c]) +- Sort(orderBy=[$f2 ASC, c ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Calc(select=[deptno, c, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1) AS $f2]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[deptno, $e], select=[deptno, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{deptno=[$0], $e=[0]}, {deptno=[null], $e=[1]}]) +- Calc(select=[deptno]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender])

TestCase.name: testGroupingSetsWithOneGrouping
TestCase.Resource: SELECT deptno, AVG(age) AS a, GROUP_ID() AS g, GROUPING(deptno) AS gb, GROUPING_ID(deptno) AS gib FROM emps GROUP BY GROUPING SETS (deptno)

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a=[AVG($1)], g=[GROUP_ID()], gb=[GROUPING($0)], gib=[GROUPING_ID($0)]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$2], age=[$6]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emps, source: [TestTableSource(empno, name, deptno, gender, city, empid, age, slacker, manager, joinedat)]]])

Calc(select=[deptno, a, 0 AS g, 0 AS gb, 0 AS gib]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[deptno], select=[deptno, AVG(age) AS a]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno]]) +- Calc(select=[deptno, age]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emps, source: [TestTableSource(empno, name, deptno, gender, city, empid, age, slacker, manager, joinedat)]]], fields=[empno, name, deptno, gender, city, empid, age, slacker, manager, joinedat])

TestCase.name: testRollup
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, c, AVG(a) AS a, GROUP_ID() AS g, GROUPING(b) AS gb, GROUPING(c) AS gc, GROUPING_ID(b) AS gib, GROUPING_ID(c) AS gic, GROUPING_ID(b, c) as gid FROM MyTable GROUP BY ROLLUP (b, c)

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0}, {}]], a=[AVG($2)], g=[GROUP_ID()], gb=[GROUPING($0)], gc=[GROUPING($1)], gib=[GROUPING_ID($0)], gic=[GROUPING_ID($1)], gid=[GROUPING_ID($0, $1)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], c=[$2], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[b, c, a, 0 AS g, CASE(OR(=($e, 0), =($e, 1)), 0, 1) AS gb, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1) AS gc, CASE(OR(=($e, 0), =($e, 1)), 0, 1) AS gib, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1) AS gic, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 1, 3) AS gid]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b, c, $e], select=[b, c, $e, AVG(a) AS a]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b, c, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], $e=[0]}, {a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[null], $e=[1]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], c=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testRollupAsGroupingSets
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, c, AVG(a) AS a, GROUP_ID() AS g, GROUPING(b) AS gb, GROUPING(c) AS gc, GROUPING_ID(b) AS gib, GROUPING_ID(c) as gic, GROUPING_ID(b, c) AS gid FROM MyTable GROUP BY ROLLUP (b, c)

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0}, {}]], a=[AVG($2)], g=[GROUP_ID()], gb=[GROUPING($0)], gc=[GROUPING($1)], gib=[GROUPING_ID($0)], gic=[GROUPING_ID($1)], gid=[GROUPING_ID($0, $1)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], c=[$2], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[b, c, a, 0 AS g, CASE(OR(=($e, 0), =($e, 1)), 0, 1) AS gb, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1) AS gc, CASE(OR(=($e, 0), =($e, 1)), 0, 1) AS gib, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, 1) AS gic, CASE(=($e, 0), 0, =($e, 1), 1, 3) AS gid]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b, c, $e], select=[b, c, $e, AVG(a) AS a]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b, c, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], $e=[0]}, {a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[null], $e=[1]}, {a=[$0], b=[null], c=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testRollupCartesianProduct
TestCase.Resource: SELECT deptno, COUNT(*) AS c FROM emp GROUP BY ROLLUP(deptno), ROLLUP(gender)

LogicalProject(deptno=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0}, {1}, {}]], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$1], gender=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

Calc(select=[deptno, c]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[deptno, gender, $e], select=[deptno, gender, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[deptno, gender, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{deptno=[$0], gender=[$1], $e=[0]}, {deptno=[$0], gender=[null], $e=[1]}, {deptno=[null], gender=[$1], $e=[2]}, {deptno=[null], gender=[null], $e=[3]}]) +- Calc(select=[deptno, gender]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender])

TestCase.name: testRollupCartesianProductOfWithTupleWithExpression
TestCase.Resource: SELECT deptno / 2 + 1 AS half1, COUNT(*) AS c FROM emp GROUP BY ROLLUP(deptno / 2, gender), ROLLUP(substring(ename FROM 1 FOR 1))

LogicalProject(half1=[+($0, 1)], c=[$3]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}], groups=[[{0, 1, 2}, {0, 1}, {0, 2}, {0}, {2}, {}]], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[/($1, 2)], gender=[$2], $f2=[SUBSTRING($0, 1, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

Calc(select=[+($f0, 1) AS half1, c]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[$f0, gender, $f2, $e], select=[$f0, gender, $f2, $e, COUNT(*) AS c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f0, gender, $f2, $e]]) +- Expand(projects=[{$f0=[$0], gender=[$1], $f2=[$2], $e=[0]}, {$f0=[$0], gender=[$1], $f2=[null], $e=[1]}, {$f0=[$0], gender=[null], $f2=[$2], $e=[2]}, {$f0=[$0], gender=[null], $f2=[null], $e=[3]}, {$f0=[null], gender=[null], $f2=[$2], $e=[6]}, {$f0=[null], gender=[null], $f2=[null], $e=[7]}]) +- Calc(select=[/(deptno, 2) AS $f0, gender, SUBSTRING(ename, 1, 1) AS $f2]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]], fields=[ename, deptno, gender])

TestCase.name: testRollupOn2Column
TestCase.Resource: SELECT gender, deptno + 1, COUNT(*) AS c FROM emp GROUP BY ROLLUP(deptno, gender)

LogicalProject(gender=[$1], EXPR$1=[+($0, 1)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0}, {}]], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$1], gender=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

TestCase.name: testRollupOnColumnWithNulls

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], groups=[[{0}, {}]], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(gender=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

TestCase.name: testRollupPlusOrderBy
TestCase.Resource: SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS c FROM emp GROUP BY ROLLUP(gender) ORDER BY c DESC

LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], groups=[[{0}, {}]], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(gender=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

TestCase.name: testRollupWithHaving
TestCase.Resource: SELECT deptno + 1 AS d1, COUNT(*) AS c FROM emp GROUP BY ROLLUP(deptno) HAVING COUNT(*) > 3

LogicalProject(d1=[+($0, 1)], c=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 3)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], groups=[[{0}, {}]], c=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(deptno=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[emp, source: [TestTableSource(ename, deptno, gender)]]])

TestCase.name: testRollupOn1Column
